description: Since get_fc_wwpns and get_fc_wwnns has almost the same code, so extract common code from these two function and add a flag to identify what info to collect.
title: Extract common code from get_fc_wwpns and get_fc_wwnns

comments.content: Since get_fc_wwpns and get_fc_wwnns has almost the same code, so extract common code from these two function and add a flag to identify what info to collect.

comments.content: That's a refactoring task, neither a bug nor a feature requests, that's why I'm closing this report. If you want to work on that, just push a change for review. Be prepared that refactoring tasks don't get much attention due to the current huge review backlog.
